meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of autotrophs.
meanings.sent1: Plants grow autotrophically by using sunlight to make their own food.
meanings.sent2: The algae in the pond photosynthesize autotrophically to survive.
meanings.sent3: The sunflower danced autotrophically in the breeze, soaking up the sunlight joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The solar panels function autotrophically, converting sunlight into electricity efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The tree stood tall, reaching autotrophically towards the sun for energy.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of autotrophs.
meanings.sent1: The autotrophically powered organisms can produce their own food.
meanings.sent2: The autotrophically functioning plants are essential for the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The autotrophically inclined bacteria happily thrived in the nutrient-rich environment.
meanings.sent4: The autotrophically designed garden utilized natural processes for growth.
meanings.sent5: The autotrophically dependent organisms flourished in the sunlight-rich habitat.
